long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SWatch - The Simple Stopwatch Extension for Chrome

Description: SWatch is a lightweight, accurate stopwatch extension designed to make time tracking easy and accessible right from your Chrome browser. Ideal for productivity, task management, or personal challenges, SWatch lets you start, stop, and record time seamlessly, with a user-friendly interface and precision down to milliseconds.

Why Install SWatch? SWatch provides a convenient solution for anyone looking to manage time efficiently. Whether you're timing work sessions, tracking activities, or simply need a quick stopwatch, SWatch is always available in your Chrome toolbar. This tool is perfect for improving productivity, staying organized, and managing workflows without needing to switch to separate applications.

Key Features:
Simple Interface: Easily accessible stopwatch with clear, intuitive controls to start, stop, and reset with just a click.
Precision Timing: Tracks time with accuracy down to milliseconds, allowing for detailed timekeeping.
Lap Functionality: Record lap times effortlessly, so you can keep track of multiple intervals within a single session.
Persistent Timer State: SWatch remembers your timer state even when you close the popup, so you can pause, resume, or check laps at any time.
Compact & Lightweight: Designed to run smoothly without impacting browser performance.
How It Works:
Click the SWatch icon in your Chrome toolbar to open the stopwatch.
Start/Stop the timer with a single click.
Record Laps to monitor specific intervals and view them in a scrollable list.
Reset the timer anytime to start fresh.
Why Users Love SWatch:
No need to switch between apps; SWatch is accessible directly in Chrome.
Perfect for task timing, workout intervals, study sessions, and productivity boosts.
Easy lap recording for detailed time analysis.
Simple design makes it easy to use for anyone, whether for work, study, or personal challenges.
Privacy Statement:
SWatch only uses local storage to keep track of timer state and lap times, ensuring user data stays private and is not shared with any third party.

Install SWatch Today! If you’re looking for a reliable, easy-to-use stopwatch that’s always at your fingertips, SWatch is the perfect tool to help you make the most of your time.
